name: Battle of Hillsbrad
tooltip:
Battle of HillsbradLevel 30

Travel to Dun Garok and kill 10 Mountaineers, 8 Riflemen, 4 Priests and Captain Ironhill and report back to Darthalia in Tarren Mill.

Requirements:
- Dun Garok Mountaineer x 10
- Dun Garok Rifleman x 8
- Dun Garok Priest x 4
- Captain Ironhill
